intent_atoms.description: Wire preset selection flags through ISOInspectorCLI and propagate configuration summaries to CLI output.
Persist user-authored presets inside ISOInspectorApp with Application Support storage and settings UI.
Extend validation export metadata (CLI, JSON, session state) to record the active preset identifier and disabled rule IDs.

functional_units.name: ValidationRuleIdentifier
functional_units.description: Represents a unique identifier for a validation rule within ISOInspectorKit.

functional_units.name: ValidationPreset
functional_units.description: Defines a set of pre-configured validation rules that can be applied together.

functional_units.name: ValidationConfiguration
functional_units.description: Encapsulates the configuration model for toggling validation rules, including preset selection and overrides.

functional_units.name: Bundled ValidationPresets.json
functional_units.description: Provides bundled presets such as "All Checks Enabled" and "Structural Focus" for use in ISOInspectorKit.
